#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        char s[1001];
        scanf("%s",s);
        int i=0,sum=0;
        while(s[i]!='\0')
        {
            if(s[i]>='0'&&s[i]<='9')
                sum=sum+s[i]-'0';
            i++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
